CustomField.description: Captures if the Quote Line has a matching Quote Line with the same Preferred Date and Time. Only applicable to "On-site" "Course" Products. Set via trigger and used with price rule to provide multi-course same day discounts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Quote Line has a matching Quote Line with the same Preferred Date and Time. Only applicable to "On-site" "Course" Products. Set via trigger and used with price rule to provide multi-course same day discounts.
CustomField.label: Same Day Course Match
